S01suvrnavu:205: pratikruṣṭaṃ caitad vairāṇāṃ yad uta strīvairam iti /
S01suvrnavu:206: sa krodhāgninā dahyamānahṛdayas tān niśāṃ kṛcchreṇātināmitavān /
S01suvrnavu:207: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām anyatamam āptapuruṣam āmantrayate /
S01suvrnavu:208_0: khaḍgam gṛhāṇa rājagṛhād bahir udyānaṃ gamiṣyāmi tatrāsti me kiñcid ātyayikaṃ prayojanam
S01suvrnavu:208_1: ity evaṃ svāminn iti sa puruṣaḥ khaḍgam ādāya tasya pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhas tataḥ pracaṇḍo
S01suvrnavu:208_2: 'mātyas tena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ rājagrān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṃ praviśyāvasthitaḥ //
S01suvrnavu:210: [17] kāśisundary api dārikā vicitravastrālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaśarīrā rājagṛān nāgarān nirgatya divākarasya sārthavāhasyodyānaṅ gatā /
S01suvrnavu:211: sā tatra praviṣṭā yāvat paśyati pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃtrastā /
S01suvrnavu:212: saṃlakṣayaty eṣa prakṛtyaiva pracaṇḍo niyataṃ me 'dya mahāntam anarthaṅ karotīti pratinivarttitukāmābhūt /
S01suvrnavu:213_0: tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāgnijvalitamanās triśikhāṃ lalāṭe bhṛkurṭiṃ
S01suvrnavu:213_1: kṛtvā pradhāvitas tatas tāṃ sarabhasaṃ keśeṣu gṛhītvā nirdayam avāṅmukhīṃ pṛthivyāṃ
S01suvrnavu:213_2: pātayitvā samākṛṣṭavān evañ cāha tvam ihāgatya suvarṇavarṇena kumāreṇa sārddhaṃ paricārayasi /
S01suvrnavu:217: tad adya te tādṛśam maryādābandhāṃ karomi yena punar na bhavatī jīvalokaṃ drakṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:219: tac chrutvā kāśisundarī dārikā tadākarṣaṇaparākarṣaṇajaṃ duḥkham agaṇayitvā maraṇabhayabhītā bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadagadakaṇṭhī hā idānīn na bhaviṣyāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:220: kampamānagātrī pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya pādayor nipatya karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair uvāca prasīdatv āryaputro nārhasi māṃ praghātayitum iti nityāparādho mātṛgrāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:221: itaḥ prabhṛti na bhūya evaṅ kariṣyāmi /
S01suvrnavu:223: tad alam anena sāhasena prayaccha jīvitam iti /
S01suvrnavu:224: tasya durātmana evaṃ karuṇadīnavilamvitair akṣarair ucyamānasya krodhāgnir vardhata eva /
S01suvrnavu:225: tatas taṃ sahāyakam uvāca śīghram asyā anena khaḍgenotkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyān nipātayety //
S01suvrnavu:227: [18] atha sa puruṣas tasya durātmano 'nyāyavaco duraktam upaśrutya kampitum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:229: aho nairghṛṇyam eṣā hi strī bahuprakāram asyopayuktā /
S01suvrnavu:230: tat kathan nāma svalpasyāparādhasyārthe praghātayitum icchati /
S01suvrnavu:231: aho vayam api jīvikābhayabhītā yena nāmāsyāśīviṣaprakhyasya puruṣādhamasya pārṣve tiṣṭhāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:233: kim atra prāptakālaṃ atha vā sphuṭam enaṃ vakṣyāmi kadācid eva sphuṭam ucyamānaḥ pratinivartetāsmāt pāpakād asaddharmād iti /
S01suvrnavu:234: viditvā samvignamanās tasyāś ca striyās tair atikaruṇair vilāpair dravīkṛtasantāno bāṣpāmbupariplutaq_īkṣaṇaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pracaṇḍam amātyam uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:235_0: prasīdatu svāmī nārhasi mām evaṃvidhe 'kārye niyojayitun nāhaṃ niṣādo nāpi vadhyaghātakaḥ
S01suvrnavu:235_1: kathaṃ hi nāma yat karmma vadhyaghātakānām api notsahate manas tatkarmaṇi pratārayati māṃ svāmī /
S01suvrnavu:236: eṣā ca strī prakāśātyartham abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvakalābhijñā rājagṛhanivāsino nānādigdeśābhyāgatasya ca vidagdhajanasyātīva vallabhā /
S01suvrnavu:238: kathaṃ hi nāma svāmin prajñātamanuṣyasya vicakṣaṇasyāsminn anunayasthāne dveṣa utpannas tad alam īdṛśena lokadvayavirudhāvāhakena vyavasāyena /
S01suvrnavu:239: prasīda nārhasi mām ātmanañ cānena duścaritāgninā dagdhum /
S01suvrnavu:242: prītim etām manuṣyāṇāṃ manye mārtimatīm iva /1/
S01suvrnavu:243: karuṇaiḥ karuṇair dīnair madhurair akṣarair iyaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:244: vijñapayati svāmiṃs te dṛṇāti mama mānasaṃ /2/
S01suvrnavu:245: kampate hṛdayam me 'dya śrutvā dīptaṃ vacas tava /
S01suvrnavu:246: ko 'sau nirghṛṇacittaḥ syād ya imāṃ hantum edhate /3/
S01suvrnavu:247: mlecchā api naināṃ hantum utsahante sunirghṛṇāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:248: kathan nu mama tāṃ hantuṃ svāmin utsahate manaḥ /4/
S01suvrnavu:249: paśūnām api yāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavaty anunayo mahān /
S01suvrnavu:250: tasyāḥ ko manuṣyo bhūtvā śastreṇa prahariṣyati /5/
S01suvrnavu:251: tat prasīda tavāyuktam api śrotum idam vacaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:252: prāg eva acarituṃ svāmin karmmedam atidāruṇam iti /6/
S01suvrnavu:254: [19] atha sa durātmā vipannāśayatvād evam api hṛdayagrāhakair vacobhis tena puruṣeṇābhidhiyamāno naiva svacittaṃ pratilabhate //
S01suvrnavu:255: saroṣabhrūlatābhaṅgaraudreṇa ca mukhena taṃ puruṣam uvāca //
S01suvrnavu:256_0: bhoḥ puruṣa kas tavāsyāṃ upary anunayo yan nāma madīyām ājñāṃ vilaṅghya necchasy
S01suvrnavu:256_1: enāṃ praghātayituṃ sarvathā yadi tvam enāṃ praghātayiṣyasīty evaṃ kuśalan no cen
S01suvrnavu:256_2: na praghātayiṣyasi tavādya jīvitaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:257: tato 'sau puruṣas tasya tat karkaśaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā bhītaś cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:259: sa ced asyājñāṃ na kariṣyāmi niyatam adya māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:260: yo hi nāmaivaṃvidhiṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ bahuprakāram upayuktaṃ praghātayitum udyataḥ sa māṃ na praghātayiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:261: kuta etat kathañ ca nāma manuṣyo 'ham ity ātmānam manye /
S01suvrnavu:262: īdṛśyā janapadakalyāṇinyāḥ striyāḥ śarīre śastraṃ nipātayiṣyāmi /
S01suvrnavu:263_0: sarvathā kāmaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evāsyāḥ prahāraṃ dāsyāmīti niścayaṃ kṛtavāṃs
S01suvrnavu:263_1: tasya buddhir utpannā yady ahaṃ khaḍgam ādāya niṣpalāyeyaṃ evaṃ mayā tv ātmā parirakṣito bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:265: sa khaḍgam ādāya tasmād udyānād niṣkramya sarvajavena niḥpalānaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:266: pracaṇḍo py amātyas tasya pṛṣṭhato dvārakoṣṭhaṃ yāvad anubaddhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:268: [20] tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gatapratyāgataprāṇam ivātmānam manyamano tvaritatvaritam utthāya niḥpalāyāmīti prākārasamīpam abhigatā /
S01suvrnavu:269: sā coccaḥ prākāraṃ na śaknoti vilaṅghayituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:270: pracaṇḍaś cāmātyaḥ pratinivṛtya yāvat tasmin pradeśe kāśisundarīṃ dārikān na paśyati /
S01suvrnavu:271: itaś cāmutaś ca vyavalokayitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati prākārasamīpam abhigatāṃ sa tvaritatvaritaṃ tasyāḥ samīpaṃ gantum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:273: tena sā dakṣiṇe caraṇe daṣṭā sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣpalānaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:275: eṣaḥ ca pracaṇḍo mām āgatya praghātayiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:279: tatas tena durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasā kāśisundarīṃ dārikāṃ tasmād atimuktakalatāgahanād ākṛṣya tasyāḥ śirasi pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:280_0: sukumārā sā strī tena prahāreṇa viṣavegena ca mūrcchitā pracaṇḍo 'py amātyas tān
S01suvrnavu:280_1: nirīkṣitum ārabdho yāvat paśyati niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ tasyaitad abhavan mṛteyam idānīṃ gacchāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:281: tataś ca māṃ mā kaścid drakṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:287: [21] suvarṇavarṇaś ca kumāro rājagṛhān niṣkramya svam udyānam anuprāptaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:288: yāvat paśyati kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ dṛṣṭvā cāsya mahāsamvega utpannaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:289: tenopalakṣitaṃ kenāpy eṣā durātmanā nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena vairānubaddhenāhānīya praghātitā bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:290: dhik kaṣṭam īdṛśā api nāma sattvā bhavanti /
S01suvrnavu:292: tena tad udyānaṃ sarvaṃ pratyavekṣitaṃ yāvan na kiñcit paśyati tasyaiva tad abhavad eṣā strī prajñātā 'sminn udyāne praghātitā /
S01suvrnavu:294: sarvathā durātmanā kenāpi svadaurātmyam antargataṃ prakaṭīkurvatā mana mastake 'yaśo 'śanir nipātita iti /
S01suvrnavu:295: sa caivaṃ samvignamanāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyasthitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:298: praviśya ca tad udyānaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:299: yāvat paśyanti kāśisundarīṃ dārikām itaś cāmutaś ca samāhṛṣṭāṃ muktakeśīṃ niśceṣṭāṃ bhūmau nipatitāṃ /
S01suvrnavu:300: dṛṣṭvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya pūrvakarmavipākasāmarthyān na tāṃ kaścit paricchinatti /
S01suvrnavu:306: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyanti /
S01suvrnavu:309: sa kathayati bhavanto 'ham api na jāne mayāpy eṣā eva dṛṣṭeti /
S01suvrnavu:311: [23] atha te rājapuruṣāḥ parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:312: bhavanta eṣa kumāro 'tyantavinīto nāsyedaṃ karma saṃbhāvyate /
S01suvrnavu:313: atra ca na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ sarvathā paramasaṅkaṭam anupraviṣṭāḥ smaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:317: etāṃ striyaṃ kumārañ ca karaṇamaṇḍapaṃ nayāmas tatrāmātyā eva paricchetsyantīti /
S01suvrnavu:318_0: tatas te rājapuruṣās tāṃ striyaṃ śivikām āropya suvarṇavarṇañ ca kumāram ādāya karaṇamaṇḍapaṅ
S01suvrnavu:318_1: gatās tatra ca karaṇamaṇḍape pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ pratipattyaivānukūlair vyavahāribhiḥ
S01suvrnavu:319: sannipatito yadbhūyasā tān eva rājapuruṣān āgamayamānas tena te dūrata eva dṛṣṭāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:320: pṛṣṭāś ca bhavantaḥ kim idam iti /
S01suvrnavu:321: tair ākhyātam eṣāsmābhiḥ strī divārakasya sārthavāhasyodyāne kālagatā dṛṣṭā tañ codyānam asmābhiḥ pratyavekṣitatam /
S01suvrnavu:322: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ muktvā na kañcid anyaṃ paśyāmaḥ eṣa cāsmābhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ /
S01suvrnavu:324: anenākhyātam aham api bhavanto na jāne mayāpy eṣā evam eva dṛṣṭeti /
S01suvrnavu:325: tad idānīṃ svāmina evaṃ pravicārayantv iti /
S01suvrnavu:328: bhavanto mūhūrtaṃ tāvad avīkṣadhvaṃ yāvad ahaṃ rājño nivedayāmīti /
S01suvrnavu:329: tena rājño 'jātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatvā daurvārikaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭo bhoḥ puruṣadevaḥ kiṃ karotīti /
S01suvrnavu:330: tenākhyātam upariprāsādatalagato niḥpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
S01suvrnavu:331: labdhapraṇayo 'sau tena pratihārī preṣitā gaccha devasya nivedayāmātyā vijñapayanti /
S01suvrnavu:332: divākarasya sārthavāhasya putreṇodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitā /
S01suvrnavu:335: tayā gatvā rājño niveditaṃ rājā tatra ratikrīḍāyām atīva śaktaḥ kathayati /
S01suvrnavu:336: gacchāmātyān evam vada yūyam evaṃ nipuṇaṃ pravicārayadhvam iti /
S01suvrnavu:337: tayā nirgatya pracaṇḍasyāmātyasya niveditam evaṃ devaḥ samājñāpayatīti /
S01suvrnavu:339: [25] tataḥ pracaṇḍo 'mātyaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapam āgatya tān rājapuruṣān uvāca /
S01suvrnavu:342: bhavanto 'nena kumāreṇeyaṅ kāśisundarī dārikā udyāne praghātitā /
S01suvrnavu:343_0: gacchatainaṃ durācāraṃ paścād bāhubandhanaṃ gāḍhaṃ kṛtvā kharasvareṇa paṭena vādyamānena
S01suvrnavu:343_1: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śravaṇamukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇamayya
S01suvrnavu:343_2: mahāśmaśān nītvā śūle samāropayata mṛtañ cainaṃ kāśisundaryā dārikayā sahaikāñ citām
S01suvrnavu:344: atha te vadhyaghātakāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram atyartham abhirūpam uttaptasuvarṇaparvvataśṛṅgam iva paramayā śriyā jvalantam udvīkṣya samvignāḥ parasparam ūcuḥ /
S01suvrnavu:345: bhavantaḥ kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakās tat katham īdṛśamatidurllabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:346: sarvathā kāmam asmākaṃ svajīvitavināśo na tv evainaṃ praghātayiṣyāmaḥ iti /
S01suvrnavu:348: [26] pracaṇḍo 'mātyas tān parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvāṇāṅ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati /
S01suvrnavu:353: kiñcāpi vayam vadhyaghātakā api notsahāmahe īdṛśaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ mahājanavallabhaṃ praghātayitum iti /
S01suvrnavu:355: bhavanto yadi yūyam enaṃ na praghātayiṣyatha /
S01suvrnavu:356: yuṣmākam evādya saputrakalatrabāndhavānāṃ jīvitāni na bhaviṣyantīti /
S01suvrnavu:359: yo hi nāma suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāram evam atidurlabhadarśanaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ parityaktum udyataḥ yo 'smān saputrakalatrabandhavān praghātayiṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:364: eṣā kumāro mahājanavallbhas tad enan tāvad vīthīm avatarāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:365: sthānam etad vidyate yan mahājanakāya evainaṃ pratimocayiṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:366: ko hy enaṃ praghātyamānam upekṣituṃ samartha iti /
S01suvrnavu:369: tañ ca tathā rūpaudāryasampadā vibhrājamānam ālokya na śaknuvanti spraṣṭuṃ tato vepamānāṅgapratyaṅgā bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ kranditum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:370: hā kaṣṭam īdṛśā api vayaṃ pāpakarmakāriṇo yenaivamvidhe kārye niyojyāmahe iti /
S01suvrnavu:372: [27] tataḥ pracaṇḍenāmātyena bhūyaḥ sakarkaśam ājñaptāḥ kim parivilambadhve /
S01suvrnavu:374: tair asau bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇair vepamānair gṛhītas tenaiva suvarṇapītena vastreṇa paścād bāhuko baddhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:375_0: tañ ca paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddham ālokya pracaṇḍam amātyaṃ muktvā sarva eva
S01suvrnavu:375_2: hā kaṣṭam idānīm eva durlabhadarśanaḥ kumāro na bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:376_0: tatas tair vadhyaghātakair vīthyām avatārito yathāsminn antare kolāhalo jātas tañ
S01suvrnavu:377: suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddham ālokya samvignamanāḥ sasambhramaṃ praṣṭum ārabdha /
S01suvrnavu:379: tatas te vadhyaghātakāḥ bāṣpoparudhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ krandanta ūcuḥ /
S01suvrnavu:380: bhavanto 'nena kumāreṇa kila kāśisundarī dārikā praghātiteti vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyate /
S01suvrnavu:381: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti /
S01suvrnavu:383: [28] tac chrutvā sa mahājanakāyas tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhata ekaraveṇoccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:384: hā hā katham ayaṃ kumāra evamabhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopeta uttaptasuvarṇavarṇayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ sarvajanamanonayanaharaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:385: paṇḍito vinītaḥ peśalo dakṣaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmmakāmaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ praghātyate /
S01suvrnavu:386: kim astaṅgatāḥ sādhavaḥ kim antarhito dharmaḥ kim adharmasyaiva niḥsapatnaṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:389: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā yam asmākaṃ parā prītir abhūt purā /1/
S01suvrnavu:390: tam enaṃ sāmprataṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyaghātair adhiṣṭhitaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:393: tasyopari kathan nāma rājñā daṇḍo nipātyate /3/
S01suvrnavu:394: nirīkṣamāṇā yan nityaṃ tṛptin nāyānti dehinaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:395: vadhāya sa kathaṃ tyakto ghṛṇā tyaktādya mantribhiḥ /4/
S01suvrnavu:396: cāritryaṃ vinayopetaṃ yasya khyātaṃ muner iva /
S01suvrnavu:397: kathaṃ saṃbhāvyate tasya hy aparādho 'yam īdṛśaḥ /5/
S01suvrnavu:398: adharmo vata jāgarti dharmaḥ supto 'tha vā mṛtaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:399: yad evaṃ guṇino 'py asya viyogo 'yam upasthitaḥ /6/
S01suvrnavu:401: [29] sa ca strīṇāṃ atīva priyas tatra kāścit striyas tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ kurvanti /
S01suvrnavu:404: ekaikās tatra putraviyogasadṛśaṃ viyogaduḥkham anubhavanti sma /
S01suvrnavu:405: mahājanavallabho 'sau mahātmā rājagṛhanagaranivāsī janakāyo yadbhūyasā tadviyogaduḥkhābhyāhato vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:409: [30] divākarasya sārthavāhasya gṛhād dārikā vīthīm avatīrṇā /
S01suvrnavu:410_0: tayā eṣa vṛttāntaḥ śrutas tataḥ krandamānā uras tāḍayantī tvaritatvaritaṃ gṛhaṃ gatvā
S01suvrnavu:410_1: yena suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya tasyāḥ purata ātmānaṃ kṣiptavatī /
S01suvrnavu:411: tataḥ suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā saṃtrastā pṛcchati /
S01suvrnavu:414_0: ārye suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ paścād bāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho vadhyaghātakair adhiṣṭhito
S01suvrnavu:414_1: 'nena kilodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitety avicāryaiva vadhāya parityakto rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyate /
S01suvrnavu:415: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti /
S01suvrnavu:417: [31] tac chrutvā suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mātā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā mūrcchitā bhūmau nipatitā /
S01suvrnavu:418: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇā utthāya hā putra hā putreti vikrośantī keśā luñcamānā uras tāḍayantī kampamānā muhur muhur moham upagacchantī gṛhān nirgatya vīthīm avatīrṇā /
S01suvrnavu:419: sā putraviyogaśokābhyāhatā viklavahṛdayā tattad vilapantī ekaikaṃ pṛcchati /
S01suvrnavu:420: katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:421: hā putrakaṃ na paśyāmi paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvaṃ putrakam me darśayateti /
S01suvrnavu:424: [32] yathā yathā sārthavāhapatnī suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāran na paśyati /
S01suvrnavu:425: tathā tathā tīvrataraśokaduḥkhābhyāhatā uccair vikrośantī ekaikasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭī vijñāpayati /
S01suvrnavu:426: paritrāyadhvaṃ paritrāyadhvam me śīghram avakāśam anuprayacchata yāvat kumāro nātikramyate anena pathā /
S01suvrnavu:427: anena pathā putrako me suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīyate yathā ca taṃ paśyāmi tathā me prasādaṃ kartum arhatheti /
S01suvrnavu:428: sā ca tatrāvakāśam alabhamānā hā kathaṃ bhoḥ putra na labha iti /
S01suvrnavu:430: tato jaloddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvarttanaparivartanaṅ kartum ārabdhā /
S01suvrnavu:445: hā paṇḍita vinīta viśārada manojña dakṣa /
S01suvrnavu:455: hā katham avicāryaivam anātho vadhāya nīyate sa iti /
S01suvrnavu:457: [33] punar api ca kṛtakarapuṭā paurān vijñapayantī /
S01suvrnavu:459: hā hatāsmi nirānandā kim idaṃ vartate mama /
S01suvrnavu:460: svapno 'yam atha vā moha āhosvic cittavibhramaḥ /1/
S01suvrnavu:462: paurān vijñāpayām āsa viruvantī muhur muhuḥ /2/
S01suvrnavu:463: avinīto virūpo vā na ca me hṛdayapriyaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:464: yad evam adhyupekṣadhvaṃ nīyamānaṃ sutam mama /3/
S01suvrnavu:465: anukampā sa ced asti pakṣapāto guṇeṣu vā /
S01suvrnavu:466: tathā me kriyatāṃ paurā yathā paśyāmi putrakaṃ /4/
S01suvrnavu:470: na viśrabdha pariṣvakto bahuśo nāpi cumbitaḥ /6/
S01suvrnavu:472: evam eva kathan nāma nīyate bhoḥ suto mama /7/
S01suvrnavu:473: śūnyā me 'dya diśaḥ sarvā vepate me kaḍevaraṃ /
S01suvrnavu:474: dahyate hṛdayañ cāpi moham eti ca mānasaṃ /8/
S01suvrnavu:476: hā hā na bhūyo drakṣyāmi sutaṃ hṛdayavallabhaṃ /9/
S01suvrnavu:477: nūnaṃ kṛtan mayā pāpam anyajanmani dāruṇaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:479: yena satyena cittam me śatruṣv api na pāpakaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:480: mucyatāṃ vyasanād asmāt tena satyena me suta iti /11/
S01suvrnavu:482: [34] divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ samudrāt saṃsiddhayānpātro rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:483: sa rājagṛhan nagaraṃ praviśan nimittāny apraśastāni paśyati /
S01suvrnavu:484: tasya hṛdayaṃ kampitum ārabdhaṃ aṅgāni sīditum ārabdhāni /
S01suvrnavu:485: netraṃ sphuritum ārabdhaṃ śakunayaś cāsya purataḥ kharam vāśitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:486: sa nimittakuśalaḥ śakunirute ca kṛtavī cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:487: yathaitāni nimittāny apraśastāni samanupaśyāmi dhruvam adya suvarṇavarṇasya kumārasya mahān upadravaḥ samupasthito bhaviṣyati /
S01suvrnavu:488: tathā hy etāni nimittāni tadviyogaṃ sūcayantīty āha ca /
S01suvrnavu:489: yathā sphurati netram me yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:491: yathā cāṅgāni sīdanti vepate hṛdayañ ca me /
S01suvrnavu:495: vepathur apragalbhapadasañcāraḥ kathañcid rājagṛham anupraviṣṭo yāvac chṛṇoti mahājanakāyasya krandanaśabdaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:496_0: sa tam ākrandanaśabdam anusaran vīthīm avatīrṇo yāvat paśyati mahājanakāyaṃ rākṣasopadrutam
S01suvrnavu:496_1: iva nagaraṃ viyogaduḥkhābhyāhataṃ krandamānaṃ tena sammukhāgato 'nyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:498: sa ca tan na jānāti yathāyam evāsau divākaraḥ sārthavāha iti /
S01suvrnavu:499_0: tenākhyātaṃ divākarasya sārthavāhasya putraḥ suvarṇavarṇo nāma kumāro 'tyantaṃ rūpādiguṇasampadā
S01suvrnavu:499_1: yuktas tena kilodyāne kāśisundarī dārikā praghātitety avicāryaiva vadhāya parityakto
S01suvrnavu:500: na cirād eva mahāśmaśānaṃ nītvā praghātyata iti /
S01suvrnavu:501: tac chrutvā divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ putraviyogaduḥkhābhyāhataḥ sahasaiva mūrcchito bhūmau nipatitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:502: tato jalābhiṣekapratyāgataprāṇa utthāya bāṣpormitaraṅgāpūryamāṇavadanakamalaḥ sambhrāntaḥ sa nirīkṣamāṇa hā katareṇa pathā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro nīto bhaviṣyatīti /
S01suvrnavu:504_0: yāvat paśyati tāvat paśyati bhāryāṃ muktakeśīm ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām uras tāḍayantīṃ
S01suvrnavu:504_1: ārtasvaraṃ tat tadvilapantīṃ sutaviyogajāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanaāpāṃ
S01suvrnavu:504_2: vedanāṃ vedayamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punas tīvramanyūparuddhagadgadāyamānakaṇṭho bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇas
S01suvrnavu:506: [36] sā taṃ dṛṣṭvā dviguṇataraśokaśalyābhyāhata bāṣpormmitaraṅgāpūryamāṇavadanakamalā sasambhramā tvaritaṃ tvaritam utthāya tasya purata ātmānaṃ kṣiptavatī /
S01suvrnavu:507: sā tato divākareṇa sārthavāhenārtasvaraṃ krandamānā pariṣvajyotthāpitā /
S01suvrnavu:509: sārthavāhaṃ paritrāyasva paritrāyasva putrabhikṣām me 'nuprayacchety āha ca /
S01suvrnavu:512: yasya janmani te svāmin ānandaaḥ paramo 'bhavat /
S01suvrnavu:513: sa eva māraṇāyādya nīyate vallabhaḥ sutaḥ /2/
S01suvrnavu:520: sarvam etad dhi kriyate etac cakṣur nirudhyate /
S01suvrnavu:522: tac chīghraṃ kriyatāṃ yatna[ḥ] sutasya parimuktaye /
S01suvrnavu:523: sarvasvam api dattvādya putraṃ māñ ca vimocaya /7/
S01suvrnavu:524: ṛdhyantu tava saṅkalpā ṛdhyatv āśāsitum manaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:525: apy eva tañ ca jīvantaṃ drakṣyāmi tava putrakam iti /8/
S01suvrnavu:527: [37] atha divākaraḥ sārthavāhaḥ putraviyogaśokaduḥkhābhyāhato 'pi dhairyam avalaṃbya cittena kṛtakarapuṭaḥ paurān uvāca //
S01suvrnavu:528: bhoḥ bhoḥ paurāḥ śrūyatāṃ kathan nāma yuktaṃ bhavatāmamedaṃ vyasanam upasthitam upekṣituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:529: katham aṭavyām ivāvicārya nagaramadhyena yuṣmākaṃ paśyatām eva prakāśaguṇo 'pi me kumāro vadhāya nīyate /
S01suvrnavu:532: kathaṃ kumārasya muktaye na prayatnadhvam iti /
S01suvrnavu:533: te kathayanti sārthavāha īdṛśo 'yaṃ kumāro guṇavāṃs tavaivaiaksyedaṃ vyasanam api tu sarveṣām evāsmākaṃ kin tūpāyan na paśyāmaḥ kumārasya pratimuktaye /
S01suvrnavu:536: bhavantaḥ parijñāta eva yuṣmābhir ayaṃ kumāro yathātyantaṃ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:537: cittam apy ayam īdṛśe 'kārye na samartha utpādayituṃ prāg evācarituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:539: yadi kumāraḥ pravicāryate niyatam asmād vyasanāt parimucyate /
S01suvrnavu:540: yūyañ ca sādhavaḥ sarvajanasādhāraṇās tad yuṣmākaṃ vijñāpayatāṃ na kaścid doṣo dṛśyate /
S01suvrnavu:543: yat kāruṇyacittaṃ paryupasthāpya gatvā rājā vijñapyatāṃ /
S01suvrnavu:544: tanmantriṇo vā kadācic ca te 'rtharucitvāt suyuktam api yuṣmadvacanam anyathā na manayanti /
S01suvrnavu:546: tataḥ sarvasvam api madīyaṃ dattvā tathā prasādaḥ karaṇīyo yathā kumāraḥ pravicāryata iti /
S01suvrnavu:549: teṣu vacanāt kumāraguṇānurāgāc cābhyupagataṃ tataḥ taiḥ pravīṇā vyavahāriṇaḥ paurikā rājakulaṃ preṣitā uktāś ca /
S01suvrnavu:550: sa ced adya kumāraḥ punar nipuṇataraṃ pravicāryate vayam api rājñaḥ suvarṇalakṣam anuprayacchāma iti /
S01suvrnavu:551: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇaḥ karaṇamaṇḍapaṅgatāḥ pracaṇḍena cāmātyena dūrata eva dṛṣṭā uktāś ca bhavantaḥ kim āgamanaprayojanam iti /
S01suvrnavu:552_0: tair ākhyātaṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaś ca paurā evaṃ vijñapayanty ayaṃ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro
S01suvrnavu:552_1: 'tyarthaṃ rūpaudāryasampadā yuktatvān mahājanavallabhaś ced asya viyogād rājagṛhanivāsino
S01suvrnavu:553: dharmābhiratatvād vinayādiguṇopetatvāc cāsya na kaścid enam aparādham abhiśraddadhāti /
S01suvrnavu:555: divākaraś ca sārthavāhaḥ sarvasvam asmadvijñaptyā suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāraḥ pratinivartya punar nipuṇataraṃ pravicāryatām evaṃ kṛte cāsmākaṃ vijñāptisākalyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati /
S01suvrnavu:559: bhavantaḥ kim atra na vicāritaṃ yad bhūyo vicāryate yac ca kathayata rājakośa eṣa saṃvarddhito bhavatīti /
S01suvrnavu:560: tata kiṃ vayam anyāyopāttair dravyai rājakośaṃ samvarddhayiṣyāmaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:562: sarvathā yūyam avaśyaṃ vaiśālakānāṃ prayogeṇāsya rājño 'narthaṅ karttukāmā yenaivam upāyenāsya rājño 'varṇaṃ niścārayitum icchatha /
S01suvrnavu:563: anyāyakāry eva rājā yad evam avicāryaṃ janapadaṃ vināśayatīti /
S01suvrnavu:565: sa tān nirbhartsayitvā catvāro 'sya kṛtāntapuruṣasadṛśāḥ santi manuṣyā atiraudrakarmāṇaḥ satatābhyāsavaśān nirghṛṇīkṛtasantānā niṣkaruṇās tān āhūya kathayati /
S01suvrnavu:567: asmādvacanācca vaktavyā śīghram enaṃ nagarān niṣkāsya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā praghātayata /
S01suvrnavu:568: na ca yuṣmābhir māṃ muktvā rājānam vānayasya kasyacid vacanenāyaṃ moktavyaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:569: evaṃ hi kurvatāṃ śreyo 'nyathāhaṃ bhavatām mahāmarāryādābandaṅ karomīti /
S01suvrnavu:570: evaṃ svāminn iti te rājapuruṣās tasya pratiśrutya khaḍgapāṇayaḥ saṃprasthitās /
S01suvrnavu:572_0: [40] te vadhyaghātakā vyākṣepaśatāni kurvāṇāḥ śainaḥ śainaḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ kumāraṃ
S01suvrnavu:572_1: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvayantaḥ paribhrāmayanto 'ho vata kumārasya kecit
S01suvrnavu:572_2: mocayitāro bhaviṣyanty apy evaṃ vayam īdṛśam akāryaṃ na kurma iti /
S01suvrnavu:573: te rājapuruṣā nikṛṣṭakhaḍgapāṇayas samprāptā tais teṣām vadhyaghātakānāṃ yathā sandiṣṭam ākhyātaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:574: uktāś ca yady enaṃ śīghraṃ nagarān niṣkrāmya yathā sandiṣṭena vidhinā na praghātayata /
S01suvrnavu:575: vayaṃ yuṣmān sāmpratam eva praghātayāma iti /
S01suvrnavu:576: te tān atisekanikṛṣṭān khaḍgavyagraṣṭān yamapuruṣān ivālokya saṃtrastās tato maraṇabhayabhītāś cintayituṃ pravṛttāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ na kenacit kumārasya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:578: bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇais tai rājapuruṣair adhiṣṭhitāḥ suvarṇavarṇaṃ nagarān niṣkrāmayitum ārabdhāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:580: [41] tañ ca nagarān niṣkāsyamānam ālokyānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ekaraveṇoccair vikroṣṭum ārabdhāni hā kaṣṭam eṣa /
S01suvrnavu:589: amī divākarasya sārthavāhasya mūrtimantaḥ prāṇā apahriyante /
S01suvrnavu:590: hā kaṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma kumāro 'ṭavyām evaṃ paribhrāmya niṣkāsito na kenacid asya paritrāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:591: eṣa sāmprataṃ rājagṛhān nagarāc candramā mṛtyurāhuṇā grasyate /
S01suvrnavu:593: etad rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ netrāmṛtam adarśanapathe vyavasthāpyate /
S01suvrnavu:597: eṣa rājagṛhanagaranivāsināṃ paurāṇāṃ hṛdayavallabho vināśāya nīyate /
S01suvrnavu:598: kam idānīṃ rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurā animiṣam avalokayiṣyanti /
S01suvrnavu:599: kam idānīṃ dṛṣṭvā prītimanaso bhaviṣyantīti nirāśībhūtāḥ //
S01suvrnavu:602: niḥkāsitaḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ kumāro rājagṛhān nagarād iti /
S01suvrnavu:604: tatas te paurikā vyavahāriṇas tac chrutvā nirāśībhūtās tair āgatya teṣāṃ paurāṇām etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇāveditaṃ /
S01suvrnavu:607: bhavanto 'pi kalirājena tādṛśaḥ pitā dhārmiko dharmarājā jīvitād vyavaropitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:608: idānīm ārabdha evaṃvidhān api prakhyātaguṇān mahājanavallabhān puruṣaviśeṣān asaṃdṛśyān praghātayituṃ /
S01suvrnavu:610: aho 'viśeṣajñatā mantriṇāṃ yo nāmaivam atyantarūpaudāryasampannatvāc ca vinītatvāc ca pūjām arhati sa eva guṇavān puruṣaviśeṣaḥ katham avicārya badhāya parityajyate /
S01suvrnavu:611: athavā kāla evāyam īdṛśaḥ samupasthito yad asanto vivarddhante /
S01suvrnavu:613: kālopakarṣya daurātmyam udbhāvayanto divākarasya sārthavāhasya etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇākhyātavantaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:615: [43] tac chrutvā vihatāśo divākaraḥ sārthavāhas tīvra śokaduḥkhābhyāhato mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ /
S01suvrnavu:616: tato jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇo viṣaṇṇamanā nirānandaḥ sāṃprataṃ putrako me praghātyata iti /
S01suvrnavu:618: locanānanda hā putra hā me kulavibhūṣaṇa /
S01suvrnavu:620: vimuhyate me hṛdayaṃ bhramanti ca diśo 'dhunā /
S01suvrnavu:623: hā kathaṃ dāruṇaṃ tāta tava vyasanam āgataṃ /3/
S01suvrnavu:627: yair evaṃ vinayopetas tvaṃ putra na vicāritaḥ /5/
S01suvrnavu:630: viśeṣo dhik sādhujano nūnam astaṅgato hṛdi /
S01suvrnavu:631: guṇavān api yat putra nirākrandaḥ praghātyase /7/
S01suvrnavu:632: tat kiṃ viproṣitāḥ sarvā nagarasyāsya devatāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:633: ghātyamānam upekṣante yad evaṃ guṇinaṃ janaṃ /8/
S01suvrnavu:634: sendrāḥ salokapālāś ca devā ye ca maharddhikāḥ /
S01suvrnavu:635: anukampām upādāya te me rakṣantu putrakaṃ /9/
S01suvrnavu:637: te 'nukampāṃ puraskṛtya parirakṣantu me sutam iti /10/
S01suvrnavu:639: [44] tasya buddhir utpannā kim artham ahaṃ viṣīdāmi yan nv ahaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakalajagad ekabāndhavaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ samunasmareyaṃ sa hi bhagavān anāthānān nāthaḥ /
